headline: Commercial DNA. Home footprint. Full programmability.
subheadline: Triple boiler system, gear pump with electronic pressure profiling, 4.3-inch touchscreen, and IoT brew logging. The Studio Pro is the closest thing to a commercial machine that fits in your kitchen.
hero_image_alt: Arco Studio Pro espresso machine in matte black, touchscreen displaying a custom pressure profile curve, gear pump mid-extraction with a bottomless portafilter showing a flawless even extraction, professional-grade setup with precision scale and distribution tools
description_long: The Studio Pro exists for the barista who's exhausted every variable on lesser machines. Its triple boiler architecture dedicates separate thermal systems to brew, steam, and hot water -- zero thermal interaction, zero compromise. The gear pump delivers electronically controlled pressure profiling: design your own curves on the 4.3-inch touchscreen, save them, share them via the IoT connection. Brew pressure is adjustable from 0 to 12 bar in real time, with repeatability measured in hundredths of a bar. The saturated 58mm group head provides the thermal mass and stability of commercial equipment. Firmware updates arrive over Wi-Fi. Brew logs sync to your phone for analysis. The plumbed-in option eliminates tank management entirely. This is the machine that turns your kitchen into a research lab -- and produces shots that rival anything coming out of a specialty cafe.
use_case_headline: Every variable. Every parameter. Your control.
use_case_body: Programmable pressure profiles from 0 to 12 bar. Triple boiler independence. Gear pump precision. Touchscreen interface with exportable brew logs. OTA firmware updates. SSP and IMS basket compatible. If you can imagine a profile, the Studio Pro can execute it.

social_proof_quote.quote: I've owned a Decent DE1 and a Linea Mini. The Studio Pro is better than both. The gear pump profiling is incredibly precise, the triple boiler system means I never wait, and the brew logging has genuinely improved my technique. This is the machine I'm keeping.
social_proof_quote.name: Felix N.
